title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync (1GILQD5)
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The software should not display an out of sync message when overwriting the exported jar file in the same directory.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Export a directory (project) as a jar file.
2. Save the exported jar file in the same directory (project).
3. Overwrite the exported jar file with a new version.
4. Note that an out of sync message is displayed.
